name: France Study I: Oppede Archway
description:
In the Summer of 2012 I spent two wonderful months in the South of France.  Without the slightest clue how to speak French, I grabbed my sketchbook, pencils, pens, and whatever else I could find, and set out on mini adventures exploring the areas nearest to my village.

For some of my favorite areas I took the time to develop my sketchbook scribbles and ideas into more detailed drawings.  These drawings were each done on 9x12" drawing paper using graphite.

Each piece is the original drawing, signed, sealed in an archival plastic sleeve with a thicker mat board of some sort to prevent bending, and shipped in a flat mailer envelope.

__
Discounts available if purchasing more than one drawing.  Email megantada@gmail.com to express interest.
__
For a peek at my other works check out meganhealy.com.
